general.title: GENERAL INTRODUCTION
general.content:
Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company was established in January 2026, operating in the field of production, processing and supplying sheet metal products for many different industries. The company specializes in processing sheet metal according to requirements with items such as laser cutting, CNC cutting, bending, punching, welding, assembly and surface finishing. Besides, Thien Loc also operates in the fields of design - manufacturing of mechanical parts, production of metal frames, electrical cabinets, cable trays, metal railings - fences, light steel structures and auxiliary mechanical products for industry and construction.

With the orientation of taking quality, progress and prestige as the core values, the company constantly invests in modern machinery systems, improves production processes and enhances the skills of the technical team. The company's headquarters and production workshop are located in Vong La village, Thien Loc commune, convenient for production, transportation and cooperation with partners in and out of the region. Thien Loc aims to become a reliable sheet metal processing unit, accompanying customers and partners for a long time on the path of sustainable development

profile.title: CAPABILITY PROFILE
profile.subtitle: THIEN LOC SHEET METAL PRODUCTION AND FABRICATION COMPANY

info.title: 1. General information
items: Company name: Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company
Address: Vong La village, Thien Loc commune
Field of activity: Sheet metal production and fabrication

fields.title: 2. Main fields of activity
fields.description: Thien Loc operates intensively in the field of sheet metal production and fabrication, including:
items: Design and manufacturing of mechanical parts
Production of metal frames, electrical cabinets, cable trays
Processing of railings, fences, light steel structures and auxiliary mechanical products for industry and construction

capacity.title: 3. Production capacity
capacity.content: The company owns a modern system of sheet metal processing machinery and equipment, well meeting the technical requirements and progress of customers. The technical team and workers are skilled, rich in practical experience, ready to advise and implement processing solutions suitable for each specific need.

quality.title: 4. Quality commitment
quality.content: Thien Loc always puts product quality - delivery progress - cooperative reputation first. Each product before handover is carefully inspected, ensuring it matches the drawings, technical requirements and achieves high aesthetic value.

development.title: 5. Development orientation
development.content: With the goal of sustainable development, Thien Loc constantly invests in upgrading machinery, improving production processes and enhancing service quality, aiming to become a reputable sheet metal processing unit, a reliable partner of customers inside and outside the region.

facilities.title: FACILITIES
facilities.intro: Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production & Fabrication Co., Ltd. always focuses on investing and completing the infrastructure system to build a professional, modern working environment, creating conditions for staff and employees to maximize their capabilities and work enthusiastically. Thien Loc is not only a gathering place for high-quality human resources but also an environment for each individual to develop, contribute and accompany the company for a long time.

section_a.title: A. Production Workshop
section_a.p1: Currently, Thien Loc owns a large-scale factory system, scientifically arranged, fully meeting production and processing requirements according to high quality standards.
section_a.p2: Production areas are arranged separately for each stage, from receiving raw materials, processing, assembling to finishing products. Each stage is supported by a system of modern machinery, equipment and auxiliary means, helping to optimize performance and ensure high precision.
section_a.p3: Besides, specialized departments conduct strict inspection and supervision after each production stage, to ensure that products when leaving the factory always achieve the best quality according to customer requirements. The industrial hygiene, labor safety and fire prevention systems are fully equipped, strictly complying with current regulations, contributing to protecting the health and safety of workers.

section_b.title: B. Office
section_b.content: Thien Loc's office system is built spaciously with a total floor area of over 700m¬≤, fully equipped with office equipment, accessories and technical equipment for professional work. The workspace is scientifically and modernly arranged, meeting the working needs of departments and creating a professional, efficient working environment.
section_b.address_value: New Cultural House, Vong La village, Thien Loc commune, Hanoi City

partners.title: PARTNERS
partners.intro: Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company always values building and developing sustainable cooperative relationships with partners, suppliers and customers in the spirit of reputation - transparency - mutual development.
partners.fields: The company is currently cooperating with many partners in the fields of mechanics, construction, supporting industries and equipment manufacturing, contributing to creating a stable and effective supply chain.
partners.collaboration: Through the cooperation process, Thien Loc constantly improves production capacity, enhances product quality and optimizes technical solutions to better meet the increasingly high requirements of partners.
partners.motto: With the motto of long-term cooperation, respecting commitments and harmonious benefits, Thien Loc aims to become a reliable partner, accompanying customers and partners in current and future projects.

privacy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.p1: Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company is committed to absolute confidentiality of all personal information of customers and partners when accessing, contacting and cooperating through the website. This privacy policy is built to clearly demonstrate Thien Loc's responsibility in respecting privacy and protecting customers' personal data.
privacy.p2: All information collected is only used for internal purposes, serving consulting, quotation and service activities. We do not buy, sell, exchange or share customers' personal information with any third party without the customer's consent, except as required by law.

collection.title: PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTION
collection.intro: Thien Loc collects personal identification information when customers voluntarily provide it, including but not limited to: full name, phone number, email address, contact address and information related to service needs.
collection.extra: Additionally, during customer website access, we may collect some technical information such as:
list: Source of access to the website
collection.footer: This information is collected to enhance user experience, improve service quality and manage, operate the website more effectively.

usage.title: PURPOSE OF INFORMATION USE
usage.intro: Customer personal information is used by Thien Loc for the following purposes:
list: Contact for consultation, answering customer requests
Provide quotations, service information and technical support
Perform contracts, orders and related obligations
Improve service quality and user experience
usage.footer: We commit to using information only for the stated purposes and within the necessary scope.

sharing.title: INFORMATION DISTRIBUTION AND SHARING
sharing.intro: Thien Loc does not share customers' personal information with external organizations or individuals, except in the following cases:
sharing.consent_body: We only share personal information when we receive clear consent from the customer.
sharing.legal_body: In case of requests from competent state agencies or for investigation and fraud prevention purposes as required by law, Thien Loc may provide information in accordance with current regulations.

security.title: INFORMATION SECURITY
security.content: Thien Loc applies appropriate management and technical measures to protect customers' personal information from risks of unauthorized access, loss, leakage or misuse. Only authorized individuals and departments are allowed to access information within the scope of their assigned work.

contact.title: QUESTIONS AND CONTACT
contact.intro: If you have any questions, concerns or comments regarding the privacy policy, please contact us through the following channels:
contact.footer: We are always ready to receive and answer all feedback from customers.

changes.title: POLICY CHANGES
changes.content: Thien Loc reserves the right to update and adjust the content of this privacy policy when necessary to suit business activities and current legal regulations. All changes will be publicly announced on the website.

time.title: APPLICATION TIME
time.content: This privacy policy is effective and applies throughout the time the Thien Loc Sheet Metal Production and Fabrication Company website is in operation.

introduction.companyName: THIEN LOC SHEET METAL PRODUCTION AND FABRICATION CO., LTD.
introduction.servicesDescription: The sheet metal processing industry plays a crucial role in many industrial and civil sectors thanks to its flexible shaping capability, high precision, and superior durability. Sheet metal products are widely applied in various industries, meeting increasingly high technical and aesthetic requirements.
introduction.coreValuesDescription: Precision in every detail ‚Äì Perfection in every product ‚Äì Dedication in every collaboration
introduction.servicesLabel: APPLICATION FIELDS OF SHEET METAL PROCESSING
introduction.commitmentDescription: Thien Loc Company commits to always accompany customers and partners in every project, bringing sustainable values, contributing to improving domestic production capacity and affirming the position of the Vietnamese mechanical industry in the regional market.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: Every detail is processed with the highest precision

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Products meet international standards, meeting strict requirements

dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.description: Accompanying and supporting customers in every project

reputation.title: Reputation
reputation.description: Commitment to quality and schedule in every task

services.mechanicalEngineeringDescription: Sheet metal processing is used to manufacture machine housings, mechanical parts, assembly components, brackets, and technical structures for production lines and industrial equipment.
services.electricalEngineeringDescription: Application in the production of industrial electrical cabinets, locker cabinets, cable trays, electrical equipment housings, ensuring safety, durability, and aesthetics for electrical systems.
services.constructionDescription: Sheet metal is processed into light steel structures, railings, doors, roofing, partitions, and construction accessories, meeting load-bearing requirements and long-term durability.
services.interiorDescription: Applied in metal furniture, tables and chairs, shelves, decorative partitions, and industrial decorative products, bringing modern style and high aesthetics.
services.industrialDescription: Processing products such as locker cabinets, storage shelves, containers, and protective frames, serving use and management needs in industrial environments.
services.transportationDescription: Manufacture equipment housings, signage, and metal structures for transportation projects and public utilities.

about.title: High-Quality Sheet Metal Processing
about.description: Discover professional sheet metal production and processing solutions at Thien Loc.
about.content: From cutting - stamping - bending - welding - electrostatic painting to assembly, we deliver precise, durable and customized products for all industries.
about.paragraph1: THIEN LOC SHEET METAL PRODUCTION AND FABRICATION CO., LTD. is a leading unit in the field of sheet metal production and processing in Vietnam.
about.paragraph2: With over 10 years of experience and a team of highly skilled technicians, we are committed to delivering quality, precision and sustainable products that meet the strict standards of industries.
about.paragraph3: From cutting, stamping, bending, welding, electrostatic painting to assembly, every Thien Loc product is meticulously processed on modern production lines, ensuring high precision and superior aesthetics.
about.paragraph4: We continuously innovate technology and improve service quality to bring the most optimal and effective solutions to all customers and partners.
